entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 4.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 03:00 AM PST Monday 06 March 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 4.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Dewpoint: 4.2°C
Wind: ESE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
